wikipedia_page.main: Charlotte Lucy "Charlie" Estcourt (born 27 May 1998) is a footballer who plays as a midfielder in the FA Women's Championship for Coventry United. and the Wales national team and most recently for FA WSL club Reading. Estcourt was named Football Association of Wales (FAW) Young Player of the Year in 2015.

response: On 23 January, Melissa Fletcher signed her first professional contract with the club, until June 2018, with Charlie Estcourt signing a similar deal on 25 January, and Becky Jane signed a new contract with Reading until June 2019 on 26 January.
On 31 July 2019, Woodham and Charlie Estcourt joined Charlton Athletic on loan for the season.
